availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William R. Fisk (Pendleton County, Kentucky, master tobacconist)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, master tobacconist. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza Fisk. Master tobacconist in Pendleton County in 1860. Captain in the 18th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) from October 13, 1861, to October 21, 1862.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, p. 3.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 6.
